item.title: Fleshing out the Merc Rework idea
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
I feel that this change is so drastic and is totally changing what the idea of the mercenary is. Mercenary is someone that is contracted to a player or a 2 players from before not against a whole group of people. Not objecting to the class idea but the name of the class should be changed in that it is not the mercenary. Same thing with sellsword even though it currently does not exist anymore in TOL. So basically change the class names other than merc and sellsword. Mercenary and Sellsword for these class names.

Point number 2!

NuclearBurrito:

goal: Have the Unseen/Cult lose

NuclearBurrito:

goal: Have the Blue Dragon lose

Just like the sorc these classes should LIVE to see the BD (sellsword) and Unseen / Cult (mercenary) fall. Mercenary would be so easy to win otherwise, which contributes no skill to the game. If they have to stay alive they have to deduce a way for them to help BD or Scum but have to avoid being killed. Makes it more skill based which as a neutral you need to have to win.
